name: unLimited Frog Game
description:
Game controls:

  • Frog Run:
    • A simple game based on Frogger. Simply get to the other side and wrap around to score a point.
    • Arrow Keys/D-Pad to move.
    • Escape/Start to Pause.
  • Frog Brak
    • Based on Brik Brak. Break blocks to score points. Dark blocks are worth double points.
    • Arrow keys/D-Pad to move.
    • Escape/Start to Pause.
  • Pongue
    • Pong + Tongue. Right player scoring increases points, left player scoring decreases them.
    • Arrow keys/D-Pad to move right player.
    • Z/X or A/B to move left player.
    • Left player controls can be swapped with Select/Enter.
    • Escape/Start to Pause.
  • Pad Hoppin
    • Navigate your frog safely from lily pad to lily pad. Don't fall in the water.
    • Arrow keys to select the next lily pad. Landing on a lily pad scores a point. 
    • Escape/Start to Pause.

A game/art project that combines a handful of arcade games into one place, but you only have 10 minutes to play them - ever. This piece speaks about the consumerism and addictiveness that are baked into games these days, and rejects those notions by only allowing you to spend a certain amount of time to play the game, after which your chance is lost.

How will you spend your time?

Made in about 32 hours for Mini Jam 106: Frogs².
